description: The antique store owner discovered a valuable artifact missing from their display case.
A customer reported their wallet stolen from their bag while shopping at a mall.
The electronics store reported a theft of several high-value laptops from the display shelf.
A customer reported a purse stolen from their unlocked car while parked outside a grocery store.
The victim's phone was stolen while they were at a busy downtown park.
